channel.description: Recent content in implementation on theagile.company

item.title: How to approach the implementation of the strategies?
item.description: It must be considered that there is nothing more difficult to carry out, nor more doubtful of success, nor more dangerous to handle, than to initiate a new order of things. For the reformer has enemies in all those who profit by the old order, and only lukewarm defenders in all those who would profit by the new order, … Niccolo Machiavelli, ~1500AC. It is not a surprise that the failure rate of large business change management efforts has been high since the 80s.
